Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120 to you, given its quality and utility. Considering its worth to others and its actual cost to me, I'm offering it to you at a special price of $100. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price. Please let me know if you're interested in this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
